Job Description:
1] Software Developer:  Under general direction the incumbent designs,  constructs,  tests,  implements the change requests /  enhancements of enterprise applications . Participates in solution implementations,  upgrades enhancements. Works with others to analyze collected requirements,  translate into programming solutions,  and ensure that Identified solutions meet business needs and expectations. Deliver fully tested source code complying with quality indicators and development standards. Investigates and resolves problems in selected modules and implementations. Learning to apply Appropriate tools to analyze,  identify,  and resolve technical problems. Maintains security,  integrity,  and business continuity controls and documents. Builds knowledge on emerging tools,  techniques and technologies. 

Requirement:  

Graduates /  Engineers with 1 - 2 years of experience in developing desktop web applications on Microsoft Technologies. Freshers can also apply.

Technical Skills:  

Hands on experience on asp.net,  MVC 4,  WPF,  WCF,  HTML 5.

Experience in managing deployed solutions on staging/ production servers.

In- depth knowledge of Microsoft SQL Server with exposure to SSIS/ SSRS.

Experience in other web technologies/ mobile frameworks would be an added advantage.

Reporting Structure:  

Will be reporting to the Manager.
